description: What are some of the things that you've inherited over the years?
teaser: What are some of the things that you've inherited over the years?
contentencoded:
We all have inherited something from our family and the people we surround ourselves with. Whether it's money, habits or mind sets.

We asked you, what are some of the things that you've inherited over the years?

Lizzie O'Leary took your answers to the Certified Financial Planner Chris Long, to find out what to do when your giving or getting.

Send us an email, or reach us on Twitter, @MarketplaceWKND

title: Your Wallet: Inheritance
